properties.name: Balanced Rock Overlook
properties.notes:
Balanced Rock Overlook
https://www.nps.gov/places/overlook_balancedrock.htm

The short walk to the overlook is on an unpaved trail.

properties.name: Big Island Overlook
properties.notes:
Big Island Overlook
https://www.nps.gov/places/overlook_bigisland.htm

This overlook is right next to the parking area and requires very little walking to see the canyon.

properties.name: Cedar Point Overlook
properties.notes:
Cedar Point Overlook
https://www.nps.gov/places/overlook_cedarpoint.htm

The walk to the overlook is 303 yards on an unpaved surface, Guideposts describeÂ the various plants along the way.

properties.name: Chasm View Overlook
properties.notes:
Chasm View Overlook
https://www.nps.gov/places/overlook_chasmviewsouth.htm

The short walk to the overlook is on an unpaved trail.

properties.name: Cross Fissures Overlook
properties.notes:
Cross Fissures Overlook
https://www.nps.gov/places/overlook_crossfissures.htm

The walk to the overlook is 357 yards on an unpaved trail.

properties.name: Devil's Lookout Overlook
properties.notes:
Devil's Lookout Overlook
https://www.nps.gov/places/overlook_devilslookout.htm

The walk to the overlook is 607 yards on an unpaved trail.

properties.name: Dragon Point Overlook
properties.notes:
Dragon Point Overlook
https://www.nps.gov/places/overlook_dragonpoint.htm

The walk to the overlook is 100 yards on an unpaved trail.

properties.name: Gunnison Point Overlook
properties.notes:
Gunnison Point Overlook https://www.nps.gov/places/overlook_gunnisonpoint.htm The South Rim Visitor Center is at Gunnison Point. A short walk will take you to the overlooks. From here the Rim Rock Trail heads to the South Rim Campground, and the Oak Flat Trail takes you on a loop below the canyon rim.

The short walk to the overlook is on an unpaved trail.

properties.name: High Point Overlook
properties.notes:
High Point Overlook
https://www.nps.gov/places/overlook_highpoint.htm

The last overlook on the South Rim Drive and the trailhead for the Warner Point Nature Trail.

properties.name: Island Peaks Overlook
properties.notes:
Island Peaks Overlook
https://www.nps.gov/places/overlook_islandpeaks.htm

The short walk to the overlook is on an unpaved trail.

properties.name: Kneeling Camel Overlook
properties.notes:
Kneeling Camel Overlook
https://www.nps.gov/places/overlook_kneelingcamel.htm

The overlook is adjacent to the parking area and very little walking is required to see the canyon. Park here to hike the Deadhorse Trail. The trailhead is just east of the parking area.

properties.name: Narrows Overlook
properties.notes:
Narrows Overlook
https://www.nps.gov/places/overlook_narrows.htm

The walk to the overlook is on an unpaved trail. The trail loops back to the parking area.

properties.name: North Rim Ranger Station
properties.notes:
North Rim Ranger Station https://www.nps.gov/places/nrimrangerstation.htm The ranger station is open intermittently during the summer. A self-pay station is available for the park entrance fee, and a self-registration board is available for wilderness permits if the ranger station is closed. Park information is posted outside the building.

This is the trailhead for the North Vista Trail, which goes to Exclamation Point and Green Mountain.

Closed in winter.

properties.name: Painted Wall Overlook
properties.notes:
Painted Wall Overlook https://www.nps.gov/places/overlook_paintedwall.htm This overlook features the tallest cliff in Colorado, the Painted Wall. From river to rim, the Painted Wall is 2,250 feet tall.

The walk to the overlook is 200 yards on an unpaved trail.

properties.name: Pulpit Rock Overlook
properties.notes:
Pulpit Rock Overlook
https://www.nps.gov/places/overlook_pulpitrock.htm

The walk to the overlook is 134 yards on an unpaved trail.

properties.name: Rock Point Overlook
properties.notes:
Rock Point Overlook
https://www.nps.gov/places/overlook_rockpoint.htm

The walk to the overlook is 234 yards on an unpaved trail.

properties.name: Sunset View Overlook at Black Canyon
properties.notes:
Sunset View Overlook at Black Canyon
https://www.nps.gov/places/overlook_sunsetview.htm

This overlook is wheelchair accessible.

properties.name: Tomichi Overlook
properties.notes:
Tomichi Overlook https://www.nps.gov/places/overlook_tomichi.htm Tomichi Overlook is the first overlook on the South Rim Drive. The Rim Rock Trail passes under the overlook, connecting the South Rim Campground to the Visitor Center.

This overlook is wheelchair accessible.
